mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_req (user_no, tag_msg, mem_cnt, price, date ) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{tagMsg}, #{memCnt}, #{price}, #{date})
mapper.select: SELECT req_no AS reqNo, user_no AS userNo, tag_msg AS tagMsg, date AS date, mem_cnt AS memCnt, price FROM customer_req WHERE user_no = #{userNo} order by date
